wikipedia_page.main: John Tracey Morgan (born 24 August 1876) was a Welsh international footballer. A goalkeeper, he spent two years as a reserve with Chirk before playing for Oswestry, Druids, Wrexham and Chester. During his career, he won the Welsh Cup three times and won a single cap for Wales in 1905.
